short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to remove content from your feed on Facebook!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension help you to remove the content that you do not want to see in your feed on Facebook. You just need to fill the fields and you will be free from all the content that you do not like.
OBS: This extension remove posts and comments with keywords.
